data.text:
They keep saying na im too intellectual and that they don’t like talking about real world issues. I told them we cant live in a bubble and they just mocked and keep mimicking the word bubble.

Am I really working with immature and childish people?
So I tried discussing the real problems brought by mental health issues, and they keep shutting me out, so far as to saying that ive never experienced being poor so I cant say anything about it.
